channel.title: Arduino on The Lorentz Force
channel.description: Recent content in Arduino on The Lorentz Force

item.title: Xiaomi Desk LED Lamp with a FOSS firmware
item.description: I needed a lamp on my table. I needed some backlight when I am working on my computer, and I needed a strong worklight when I am soldering and working on electronics. I found Xiaomi LED wifi lamp in my home town, of all the places. And, actually, that was the cheapest place I was able to find it anywhere, including the Internet. I brought it home, and it was great.
